name: Pizza Waffles Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: pizza dough, marinara sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, pepperoni
recipeIngredient: 1 (14-ounce) tube pizza dough or homemade pizza dough
recipeInstructionSteps: Slice the pizza dough into 8 equal pieces, then press each piece flat.
Place 4 pieces of dough into a preheated, greased waffle iron.
Spread one tablespoon of marinara, ¼ cup (25 grams) of mozzarella, and 3 slices of pepperoni on each piece of dough.
Top with the 4 remaining pieces of dough and seal.
Cook for 3-5 minutes, until golden brown, then serve.
